meaningMnemonic: The <radical>moon</radical> grants a <radical>gladiator</radical> its <radical>power</radical> so he will <kanji>win</kanji>! <kanji>Victory</kanji> will be his!
readingMnemonic: He <kanji>win</kanji>s over and over again, and soon the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) is even rooting for him. In fact, the Shougun claims him as his personal gladiator of choice.
